Interface IRepository<T,ID>

Type Parameters:
T - The entity type
ID - The ID type
All Known Subinterfaces:
IEnquiryRepository, IProjectRepository, IUserRepository
All Known Implementing Classes:
CSVEnquiryRepository, CSVProjectRepository, CSVRepository, CSVUserRepository
public interface IRepository<T,ID>
Generic repository interface for CRUD operations. Follows the Repository Pattern for data access.

    • findAll

      List<T> findAll()
      Finds all entities.
      Returns:

    • findById

      Optional<T> findById(ID id)
      Finds an entity by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID to search for
      Returns:
      An Optional containing the entity if found, empty otherwise

      Parameters:

    • existsById

      boolean existsById(ID id)
      Checks if an entity exists by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID to check
      Returns:
      true if the entity exists, false otherwise
